Title: The ABC's of Beth
Writer: Justin Roiland (created by), Dan Harmon (created by), Mike McMahan, Jane Becker (executive story editor), Sarah Carbiener (story editor), Erica Rosbe (story editor), Tanner Tananbaum (staff writer)
Actors: Justin Roiland, Chris Parnell, Spencer Grammer, Sarah Chalke
Plot: Rick brings Beth to a world he created for her when she was younger while Beth looks for a long-lost childhood friend trapped there for years.
